channel.title: Descriptive Thread Titles/ Beginning Post
channel.description:
I'm rather tired of seeing a forum section with countless number of non-descriptive thread titles. It's not that hard to title your thread with something that gives a small indication of your problem. It allows the forum members to help you with a lot more ease.
All threads with titles/posts like...
[ul][li]"Halp me lol"[/li] [li]"cleint.jaba compiler probelim"[/li] [li]"HELP PROBLEM"[/li] [li]"Post or I'll remove"[/li] [li]"ABOUT TO REMOVE!"[/li][/ul]
will be locked immediately by me. Please just avoid the use of excessive capital letters and poor spelling. It's not too much to ask. Failure to keep this in mind will result in a lock of your topic and/or action being taken against your forum account.

item.title: Descriptive Thread Titles/ Beginning Post
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Bump lol, people never read this.

Read full topic
